landingPage.name: Maciek Iwaniuk.
landingPage.description: I am a computer science student, with a strong emphasis on enhancing my skills. I aspire to build my future in the IT industry and constantly strive to develop myself to stay up to date with the latest technologies.

zse.title: Secondary Technical School of Electrical Engineering in Bialystok
zse.content: I gained a basic understanding of computer science, including general knowledge of web, desktop, and mobile development, as well as databases.

transparentData.content: Development of a distributed microservices-based system related to provision of economic data. Integration with multiple external APIs.

ebrand.content: Development of a distributed microservices-based system related to online brand protection. Integration with multiple external APIs.

merinosoft.content: Development of a web application related to the management of employees in a company.

shopSystem.title: Shop system
shopSystem.content: Backend of a simple store system. The project is based on CQRS along with hexagonal architecture.

isocapi.title: ISOCAPI
isocapi.content: A platform for retrieving data via API from popular auction apps, operating in a pay-per-use model.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.content: A website summarizing information about myself. It includes information about my education, commercial experience and projects, whilst being interactive and animated.

snakeMonorepo.title: Snake - Web and Desktop Application
snakeMonorepo.content: A Snake game project consisting of both a desktop and a web application. The game's functionality is connected to the server on the web application.

minesweeper.title: Minesweeper
minesweeper.content: A sapper game with a selectable game difficulty and a save option, which saves choices as well as user records to the local browser memory.
